name: Clumsy God
description:
A dangerous earthquake has befallen your people. They need your assistance to rebuild and replace their fallen structures. Just be careful not to crush anyone along the way... unless that's your thing... we won't stop you...




Note: This game is playable beginning-to-end but it is still a work in progress. Many placeholders such as certain buildings and props will be replaced in the final build. The soundtrack is being finalized and a theme song is being recorded. Plus, like, it takes time, you know.
